name: FlickIT with Friends
blurb: FlickIT with Friends brings the Paper Football game to digital 3D stadiums where friends can FlickIT and KickIT across the country.

rewards.reward: WAITING LIST \u2014 This gets you onto the list for updates to the Kickstarter, and ensures that we'll let you know how things progress with development. (Updates will continue off and on after the Kickstarter funds.)

FLICKIT FAN \u2014 We'll send you the current pre-release version of the game for your chosen platform (PC/Mac/Android, sorry iOS is not possible) as soon as the project is funded. Once the final version of the game is ready to roll out, we'll make sure you get a copy as well. You save 30% just by backing us at this stage! (Retail price of the game is set for $10.) We'll also set you up with access to the development forums, meaning you'll get to give us feedback before the game comes out later this year! You'll get regular updates from us and have a line of communication which ensures you can help us make FlickIT the best game it can be!

SOUVENIR HOUND \u2014 In addition to the benefits of the FLICKIT FAN tier, you'll be mailed a limited edition paper football with our official "FlickIT with Friends\u201d insignia. This souvenir will be mailed to you shortly after the project is funded, and will be accompanied by a thank you letter. There will only be 5000 of these paper footballs made, each numbered XXXX of 5000. (This reward is limited to those in the US only.)

FRANCHISE OWNER \u2014 You get the benefits of the DIGITAL SOUVENIR HOUND tier and pick up a little something extra for backing at the $20 level. You will be given the ability to play as any of the 12 teams, right form the start. No waiting for the right achievements (you can see the progression in the main text): you'll get to play the teams you choose immediately. So don't be stuck playing the Mustangs. Trade on up to the Sharks, Wildcats, or whatever other team catches your eye!

TEAM FANATIC \u2014 This tier includes the FRANCHISE OWNER and SOUVENIR HOUND benefits and offers you an exclusive bit of team swag to boot. You'll get a football with the logo of your choice of the twelve teams printed on it. There will only be 200 of each team's footballs made, so not many people will have access to one of these puppies. The footballs are numbered XXX of 200, and as an exciting bonus, each of them is signed!

PRO BOWLER \u2014 All the benefits of the FRANCHISE OWNER, but with one big difference: you'll be playing in the Pro Stadium from day one. Normally it takes a hundred victories to score the right to compete in the Pro stadium. In addition, with this tier of support, you have the right to participate in the online Tournament of Champions right away. That's something that takes at least 200 victories to achieve in the normal game! (You'll still want to hone your skills, of course, but only backers at this level will be able to participate in the Tournament with such ease.)

EXPANSION CITY COACH \u2014 This exclusive tier gives you the benefits of the PRO BOWLER while kicking in a special Kickstarter treat. Anyone will be able to buy the game after release. Anyone can play up through the achievements and unlock the teams and stadiums. But only backers at this level will be granted the rights to play as team number 13: The Bone Crushers! This team has amazing art (see the main text) and will only ever be available through Kickstarter. Don't hesitate to grab your piece of FlickIT with Friends history.

PIGSKINS IN SPACE \u2014 Everything the EXPANSION CITY COACH tier offers, plus a huge weight off your shoulders. No longer do you need to win 500 online multiplayer games to unlock the Space Stadium. You'll be bouncing around in low gravity from the word go. Pledging in the triple digits means a lot to our team, so we're offering up this final time-consuming unlock for backers at this level. It's the least we can do for your support.

MEMORABILIA COLLECTOR \u2014  All the awesomeness of the PIGSKINS IN SPACE and SOUVENIR HOUND tiers plus the TEAM FANATIC tier gone wild! You get not just one team's football, but all twelve of them! Signed and numbered (XXX of 200) team footballs are yours along with your FlickIT with Friends football (XXX of 5000). Plus you get an original hand drawn sheet of concept art from the game's development.

CORPORATE SPONSOR \u2014 While the rewards of the PIGSKINS IN SPACE tier are yours at this point, this level of dedication to the game's development brings with it another amazing Kickstarter exclusive. Instead of the generic Pro Stadium, your game will feature a customized field name. This custom name will not only be available when you are playing, but will also be visible to your opponent in any multiplayer game you host. They'll probably ask about it. They'll no doubt want it for themselves. But this is the only chance anyone is ever going to get to name a FlickIT with Friends stadium. (Names are limited to 30 standard English alpha-numeric characters including spaces. We reserve the right to determine if a name is in good taste before accepting it.)

HALL OF FAMER \u2014 All the benefits of the CORPORATE SPONSOR and MEMORABILIA COLLECTOR tiers are yours. You will also be immortalized, as your name will appear on the blackboard inside the in-game classroom. This is as a thank you for your generosity in helping us get FlickIT with Friends funded. (Limited to 20 standard English alpha-numeric characters including spaces. We reserve the right to determine if a name is in good taste before accepting it.)

PATRON OF THE GAME \u2014 While the benefits of the HALL OF FAMER are vast indeed, there's still one last thing left for anyone bold enough to claim it. We'll send a team member to you with a brand new tablet (and the latest and greatest FlickIT with Friends) which you'll get to keep. (The tablet, not the team member...we need them back to finish the game!) While they're spending the day with you they'll be filming, so you'll be featured (playing the game, of course, and maybe chatting with the team member) on our website. We'll also give you the inside scoop on what it's like making FlickIT with Friends. And if you're interested in development, we'll make sure to send a programmer who will give you a peek into our Unity 3D process!  (Limited to the continental US.)
